attributes.action: Conduct a public inquiry into the grooming gangs
attributes.additional_details: The dire need for a public inquiry is not just a choice, but an absolute necessity for stripping the veil off the truth about grooming gangs, exposing the perpetrators, and ultimately healing our nations. Beyond justice, an inquiry will also serve as a show of our earnest commitment towards securing the safety of our children and young adults. Only truth and justice will allow us to move on and mend the damages inflicted on our society.
attributes.background: We the people severely perturbed by this growing issue and are left longing for the truth.Despite innumerable instances of the grooming gangs being brought to light, no comprehensive public inquiry has been conducted yet. Therefore, we urgently need a full public inquiry into this critical matter
